      • CTrace

        public CTrace(CCoverageLog clog,

    • Method Detail

      • recordThread

        public void recordThread(CThread t)
        Record existence of thread. Implementation note: not done every time through recordStep(org.cooperari.core.CThread) for efficiency reasons.
        Parameters:
        t - The thread at stake.

      • recordStep

        public void recordStep(CThread t)
        Record a step for one thread.
        Parameters:
        t - The thread at stake.

        Parameters:

        type - event type

      • save

        public void save(CReport report,
                 Optional<Throwable> failure)
          throws IOException
        Write trace to a output file.
        Parameters:
        report - Output file.
        failure - Optional failure that may have happened during execution.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset.
